secText:
Lesson:
1. Define [OBJ:expsec_f954:work].
2. [OBJ:expsec_f956:Calculate work] and define the unit for work.

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_37447:Calculate] the work done on an object when the object is moving horizontally.
2. [OBJ:qc_37452:Calculate] the work done on an object when the object is moving vertically.
